hero.mission: Building a transparent, efficient, and accessible justice system for all.
hero.tagline: Modern court management that serves the public good.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Open access to case information and court proceedings builds public trust and accountability.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.desc: Streamlined workflows reduce delays, lower costs, and improve outcomes for all parties.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.desc: Inclusive design ensures everyone can navigate the justice system with dignity and ease.

trust.title: Trust & Accountability
trust.desc: Rigorous standards and clear oversight protect the integrity of judicial processes.

case-intake.name: Case Intake
case-intake.summary: Efficient digital filing and classification of new cases with automated validation and routing.

scheduling.name: Scheduling
scheduling.summary: Intelligent calendar management coordinating judges, attorneys, and parties with conflict detection.

digital-records.name: Digital Records
digital-records.summary: Secure, searchable document management with audit trails and retention compliance.

public-access.name: Public Access
public-access.summary: Transparent portal for case lookups, hearing schedules, and public records requests.
